item.title: Group By and nunique with Pandas Python
item.description: As a frequent Excel user, I have always wondered how things can be done differently with Pandas Python. A few weeks ago I received an interview test for a Junior Finance Manager position. In this test, I was provided with a table of data which contains the following columns: Customer id Order date Order value Order id I was asked to analyse the table of data and find out ‘how many customers made how many orders’.

item.title: About Me
item.description: I like to design and develop websites that are functionally and aesthetically pleasing. Languages that I speak include: Javascript HTML CSS SASS Reactjs
